root.name: Masters of the Universe: He-Man: Defender of Grayskull
root.description: Overview In conjunction with Hasbro and to tie into a 2002/2003 relaunch of He-Man action figures and cartoons, TDK Mediactive began production of an accompanying game. As He-Man, players explore three environments on foot and on the back of Battle Cat through 34 levels. Gameplay relies heavily on sword/axe fighting with some shooting via Battle Cat's guns. Troubled ReleaseOriginally planned for Xbox as well, MotU He-Man:DoG was delayed several times and wound up only making it out on PlayStation 2 and only in Europe.
